Banner.Subtitle: Future Software Developer & Designer
Banner.Description: Holding a degree in Web Design and Communication, I am currently enrolled in a Software Development program, I am learning to design modern, structured interfaces that adhere to current professional standards. I am actively seeking an internship to validate my training and contribute to concrete projects.
Banner.Countdown2: left to find my next internship. 👀
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a front-end developer for two years on a development team, I contributed to the design and evolution of features for a marketing product.
After a difficult personal period between 2020 and 2023, which allowed me to step back and rebuild, I chose to return to development with renewed ambition.

Currently training to be a Software Designer and Developer, I am consolidating and expanding my skills as a Web Designer, UI/UX Designer, and Front-end Developer to Back-end projects, with the ambition of eventually becoming a Full-Stack Developer.
Determined and meticulous, I am looking to transform this new step into a concrete impact for my future.
Here are some of the languages and technologies I have had the opportunity to experiment with and discover in recent years:
AboutMe.ImgTitle: Click to view image in full screen
Experience.Title: Retrospective

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Designer and Developer Training
Description: Learn to design and code secure applications using a multi-layered software architecture, starting from the expression of a need.
Learn to design or modify a data model (UML), and to create or modify a database.
Advanced Programming: Object-Oriented Programming with Java and JavaScript.
Web Development: Advanced JavaScript/TypeScript and in-depth learning of Angular for the front end.
Introduction and learning of Python, Artificial Intelligence, and Django for the back end.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Project Management and DevOps.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Bartender
Description: Preparation and service of cocktails / drinks.
Welcoming customers.
Inventory management.
Bar and restaurant maintenance.
Because life sometimes throws us all sorts of curveballs, this period represents a time of total reassessment for me, allowing me to refocus on what's essential.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Team-based frontend development of evolving features for the Iconosquare product. (Iconosquare is an international platform for professionals who want to track their social media activity statistically and analytically.)
Maintenance of project features and Customer Support.
Working in collaboration with the Marketing and Design teams.
Creating complex features with JavaScript and ReactJs.
Implementing in-house solutions and software.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web Developer Training
Description: Learning the fundamentals of web development.
Understanding development environments.
Introduction to PHP and the Symfony framework during a group project
Introduction to UX/UI.
Study of best practices.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web designer
Description: Setting up a newsletter and integrating it using HTML/CSS.
Graphic redesign and integration of the existing website.
Creation of print and digital communication materials.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Professional Bachelor's Degree in Sensory Web Design and Online Creation Strategies
Description: Design and development of digital interfaces on various types of screen media. Proficiency in Sketch, Illustrator and Photoshop software.
Technical development of websites: Designing the HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript (Vanilla & jQuery) integration of a project.
Using CSS3 preprocessors: LESS & Sass.
Multimedia creation (animation, video editing).
Project management, law & economics of the web

Experience.Jobs.Title: Bachelor's Degree in Language, Information and Communication Sciences
Description: Linguistics and semiotics, phonetics, phonology, morphosyntax, lexicology, sociolinguistics and field linguistics, theories of writing, information and communication.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Analysis, design, and development of an Angular frontend connected to a Python backend with Django, based on a relational database, using a RESTful architecture compliant with professional standards.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Phaser.js - In progress
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: I'm currently practicing creating a small browser game using Phaser.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Carbon Footprint Calculator - In progress
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A small program that calculates our carbon footprint based on our travels, used for practicing form and guard management, as well as operators in RxJS; still under development to be integrated with Tailwind, which I'm experimenting with.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Eco bâtisseurs - 2018

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Bo Concept - 2018
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Landing page to present a fictional furniture sales company, created as part of my professional degree in Web Design

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Web Project Management Folder - 2018
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Project management report, produced during a supervised project as part of my professional degree in Web Design.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Web Project Report Folder - 2018
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Complete report describing the analysis and creation process of a newsletter and the redesign of the SEHV website. Completed as part of a 4-month internship.

Contact.Title: I have lots of little projects in mind, and my desire to learn new things grows every day!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
